Edits.Value:
Capable of being equipped with different modules.
Requires a Mining Head to extract ores, some ores require additional modules. Missing Modules will be indicated with a blue light.

NOTE: Node purity and modules affect the miner's 'Mining Efficiency'. This value is multiplied with the base extraction rate of the attached mining head.

Base Efficiency per Node Purity:
Impure:    50%,
Normal:   100%,
Pure:        200%
